summary: Critical security patch addressing CVE-2026-1234 (authentication bypass) and CVE-2026-1235 (XSS in dashboard). All users should upgrade immediately.

fixes.title: Authentication bypass via crafted JWT
fixes.description: Malformed JWTs could bypass signature verification. Fixed by enforcing strict algorithm allowlist.

fixes.title: Stored XSS in dashboard comments
fixes.description: User-supplied HTML in comments was not sanitized. Fixed with DOMPurify integration.

breaking_changes.title: JWT algorithm restricted to RS256
breaking_changes.description: HS256 and none algorithms are no longer accepted.
breaking_changes.migration: Ensure all token issuers use RS256 signing.
